# Descriptive Statistics

* understanding how to describe data
* exploring data issues
* checking distributions - understanding the nuiances of parametrics and non-parametric
* why does the CLT and normality matter - or does it?

* parametric, non-parametric rank based methods, semi-parametric bootstrapping
